General.Description: Loopring is known as LRC is a protocol and a decentralized automated execution system that trades across the crypto-token exchanges, shielding users from counterparty risk and reducing the cost of trading. By pooling the liquidity of cryptocurrencies, we are building the financial system of the future.
General.Features: Reduced Counterparty & Exchange Risk. Secondly, it is decentralized trade’s funds automatically executed while remaining under their smart contract on the blockchain. Moreover, Order Sharing is one of the helpful features because it allows to order break into small pieces, identifies. In addition, LRC is designed as cross-chain protocol which all ERC20-like tokens on such a blockchain.Tokens always remain in their blockchain addresses during the whole transaction life cycle, Order Sharing: allows to order break into small pieces; identifies the best exchanges and times to trade those pieces on; and applies game theoretic logic to optimize trading results; Cross-chain protocol
General.Technology: LRC was designed base on the ERC20 Ethereum Token Standard, which can take token standard describes the functions and events. Ethereum is quite beneficial to the Ethereum ecosystem and all of these digital assets. They are cross-compatible and across different platforms to send users useful data directly.
General.Sponsor: Loopring was official born  in Nov 2016. Then LRC got listed on hitBTC with the goals such as Decentralized Exchange, decentralized automated execution system that trades across the crypto-token exchanges, shielding users from counterparty risk.

ICO.Description: The LRC's ICO successfully happened and the token is currently relatively cheap($0.292 at a $146m market cap) and it’s become oversold recently.
